name: Block Breaker (cnkrtn)
description:
A block breaker arcade game developed as part of my learning journey. The artwork for the background has been selected from my brother's portfolio and the music has been created for this game by myself( Cenk Ertan), my brother (Yiğit Ertan), and our friend(Can Felah), the other member of our newly formed team. Hope you enjoy!

-Move the paddle left and right with the mouse and fire the ball with the left mouse button at the start of the game.

-Press Esc or Spacebar to pause the game and enable the menu.

-Try to catch the blue balls(Power-Ups) for extra points and quirks. Be aware that not all the quirks are positive.

-Catching 10 Power-ups enables guns for a limited time which you can fire with the left mouse button. You can track the progress with the bar on top of the screen.
